sentence: The image depicts a webpage for "Cleveland's Classic Console & Arcade Gaming Show" (CCAG).
sentence_cn: 该图展示了“克利夫兰经典游戏机与街机游戏展”（CCAG）的网页。
words: Cleveland's Classic Console & Arcade Gaming Show

sentence: The page has a dark, space-themed background with yellow and green text.
sentence_cn: 该页面采用深色、太空主题的背景，并配有黄色和绿色文字。

sentence: ### Header:
- Logo: The top left shows the CCAG logo with the tagline "Classic Console & Arcade Gaming Show."
sentence_cn: - 标志：左上角显示 CCAG 标志，标语为“经典游戏机和街机游戏展”。

sentence: - Navigation: A menu at the top includes links for Home, FAQ, Contact Us, Help Us Grow, CCAG Store, Forum, and Links.
sentence_cn: - 导航：顶部的菜单包括主页、常见问题、联系我们、帮助我们成长、CCAG 商店、论坛和链接的链接。

sentence: ### Main Content:
sentence_cn: ### 主要内容：

sentence: - CCAGShow 2016 Info:
sentence_cn: - CCAGShow 2016 信息：

sentence: - Date: Saturday, July 23, 2016.
sentence_cn: - 日期：2016 年 7 月 23 日，星期六。

sentence: - Location: North Olmsted Soccer Sportsplex, 31515 Lorain Rd., North Olmsted, Ohio.
sentence_cn: - 地点：北奥尔姆斯特德足球运动中心，31515 Lorain Rd.，俄亥俄州北奥尔姆斯特德。

sentence: - Time: Noon to 8 PM.
sentence_cn: - 时间：中午至晚上 8 点。

sentence: - Admission: $10; free for kids age 12 and under.
sentence_cn: - 门票：10 美元；12 岁及以下儿童免费。

sentence: - Note: All vendors and attendees receive one Chinese Auction Coupon.
sentence_cn: - 注意：所有供应商和与会者都会收到一张中国拍卖优惠券。

sentence: - Flyer Section:
sentence_cn: - 传单部分：

sentence: - Contains images of the show flyer available in both color and greyscale.
sentence_cn: - 包含彩色和灰度两种形式的演出传单图像。

sentence: - Instructions on how to save the flyer are provided.
sentence_cn: - 提供有关如何保存传单的说明。

sentence: ### Sidebars:
sentence_cn: ### 侧边栏：

sentence: - General Menu: Links to Home, FAQ, Contact Us, Help Us Grow, CCAG Store, Latest News Archive, Forum, and Links.
sentence_cn: - 常规菜单：链接到主页、常见问题解答、联系我们、帮助我们成长、CCAG 商店、最新新闻档案、论坛和链接。

sentence: - Vendor Table Status: A link for vendors to check the current status of tables.
sentence_cn: - 供应商桌子状态：供应商用于检查桌子当前状态的链接。

sentence: - Support CCAG Show: Instructions for supporting the show via PayPal, excluding credit cards.
sentence_cn: - 支持 CCAG 节目：通过 PayPal 支持节目的说明，不包括信用卡。

sentence: ### Bottom Section:
sentence_cn: ### 底部部分：

sentence: - CCAGShow 2015 Sponsors: A mention of a $200 donation from Video Game Connection, detailing a "CONNECT - O - CASH Shopping Spree!" with an image of a mock currency or prize certificate.
sentence_cn: - CCAGShow 2015 赞助商：提到了来自 Video Game Connection 的 200 美元捐款，并详细介绍了“CONNECT - O - CASH 购物狂欢节！”，并附上了模拟货币或奖品证书的图片。

sentence: The overall design is retro-themed, aligning with the classic gaming focus of the event.
sentence_cn: 整体设计以复古为主题，与活动的经典游戏重点相一致。
